==Trivia==
* The title "Ominous Fandango" may be a tribute to a popular community meme. It is a reference to a line in the 1975 song "{{w|Bohemian Rhapsody}}" by British rock Orchestra {{w|Queen (Band)|Queen}}: "Scaramouche, scaramouche, will you do the fandango?"
